thread.title: Oil & Gas Refining & Marketing Stocks' Research Reports Released on Ultrapar Participacoes, Valero Energy, Valvoline, and World Fuel Services

author: cnbc.com
title: Oil & Gas Refining & Marketing Stocks' Research Reports Released on Ultrapar Participacoes, Valero Energy, Valvoline, and World Fuel Services

organizations.name: oil & gas refining & marketing stocks' research reports released on ultrapar participacoes

text:
NEW YORK, Feb. 8, 2018 /PRNewswire/ --
WallStEquities.com strives to bring the best free research to the investment community. Today we are offering reports on UGP, VLO, VVV, and INT which can be accessed for free by signing up to www.wallstequities.com/registration . Pre-market, WallStEquities.com reexplores the Oil and Gas Refining and Marketing market, which is highly fragmented and includes segments such as petroleum products and natural gas. In this morning's lineup are: Ultrapar Participacoes S.A. (NYSE: UGP), Valero Energy Corp. (NYSE: VLO), Valvoline Inc. (NYSE: VVV), and World Fuel Services Corp. (NYSE: INT). All you have to do is sign up today for this free limited time offer by clicking the link below.
www.wallstequities.com/registration
Ultrapar Participacoes
Sao Paulo, Brazil headquartered Ultrapar Participacoes S.A.'s stock finished Wednesday's session 2.53% lower at $24.27. A total volume of 499,462 shares was traded, which was above their three months average volume of 472,010. The Company's shares have advanced 1.13% in the past month, 1.08% over the previous three months, and 15.63% over the past year. The stock is trading above its 50-day and 200-day moving averages by 4.16% and 3.59%, respectively. Furthermore, shares of Ultrapar Participacoes, which through its subsidiaries, engages in the liquefied petroleum gas distribution, fuel distribution, and related businesses, have a Relative Strength Index (RSI) of 49.31. Get the full research report on UGP for free by clicking below at: www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=UGP
Valero Energy
Shares in San Antonio, Texas headquartered Valero Energy Corp. ended at $89.84, declining slightly by 0.69% from the last trading session. The stock recorded a trading volume of 4.34 million shares, which was above its three months average volume of 3.26 million shares. The Company's shares have gained 10.30% in the previous three months and 37.29% over the past year. The stock is trading 19.05% above its 200-day moving average. Moreover, shares of Valero Energy, which operates as an independent petroleum refining and ethanol producing company in the US, Canada, the UK, and Ireland, have an RSI of 38.45.
On February 02 nd , 2018, Valero Energy announced that members of its management will attend the Bank of America Merrill Lynch Refining Conference on March 08 th , 2018. Gain free access to the research report on VLO at: www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=VLO
Valvoline
Lexington, Kentucky headquartered Valvoline Inc.'s stock ended yesterday's session 0.08% lower at $23.60. A total volume of 2.67 million shares was traded, which was above their three months average volume of 1.56 million shares. The Company's shares have advanced 1.68% over the past year. The stock is trading 0.77% above its 200-day moving average. Additionally, shares of Valvoline, which manufactures and markets automotive and industrial lubricants, have an RSI of 25.12.
On January 31 st , 2018, Valvoline announced that its Board of Directors declared a quarterly cash dividend of 7.45 cents per share of the Company's common stock. The dividend is payable on March 15 th , 2018, to shareholders of record as of the close of business on March 01 st , 2018. Signing up today on Wall St. Equities will give you access to the latest report on VVV at: www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=VVV
World Fuel Services
On Wednesday, shares in Miami, Florida headquartered World Fuel Services Corp. recorded a trading volume of 493,139 shares. The stock finished 2.28% lower at $25.34. The stock is trading below their 50-day moving average by 9.23%. Furthermore, shares of the Company, which provides energy procurement advisory, supply fulfillment and transaction, and payment management solutions to commercial and industrial customers in the aviation, marine, and transportation industries, have an RSI of 28.73. Register now for today's free coverage on INT at: www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=INT
--
Wall St. Equities :
Wall St. Equities (WSE) produces regular sponsored and non-sponsored reports, articles, stock market blogs, and popular investment newsletters covering equities listed on NYSE and NASDAQ and micro-cap stocks. WSE has two distinct and independent departments. One department produces non-sponsored analyst certified content generally in the form of press releases, articles and reports covering equities listed on NYSE and NASDAQ and the other produces sponsored content (in most cases not reviewed by a registered analyst), which typically consists of compensated investment newsletters, articles and reports covering listed stocks and micro-caps. Such sponsored content is outside the scope of procedures detailed below.
WSE has not been compensated; directly or indirectly; for producing or publishing this document.
